title: It's Always Sunny's Kaitlin Olson is Baywatch realness on beach day
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia’s Kaitlin Olson has Pamela Anderson quaking in her red swimsuit as she showed off her best Baywatch slow-mo run.

The actress was enjoying some downtime with husband and co-star Rob McElhenney when he filmed her running into the water in a bikini.

And in a style that only Kaitlin can do, she’s beauty, she’s grace…and she fell flat on her face.

Advertisement

Trust these guys to keep it real.

Kaitlin and Rob, who have been married for 11 years, are never afraid to mock each other in the most savage ways possible while also declaring how much they love each other.

It’s really sweet to watch, in a really weird way.

The couple, who met on set of cult-favourite It’s Always Sunny, fell in love on set and hid their relationship for a year before going public with their romance.

Rob and Kaitlin have been married for 11 years (Picture: FilmMagic)

Jump to today, the pair have two children together, and still make it a mission to make each other laugh.

Despite their on-screen counterparts being the worst people in the history of existence, it seems that Paddy’s pub is quite the romantic hotspot, with all their leading characters married off to each other.

Charlie Day (Charlie) is married in real-life to The Waitress (Mary Elizabeth Ellis), in a far more successful shot at a relationship than their characters, who have been trying to make romance work in quite possibly the worst bids at wooing each other ever.

Meanwhile Glenn Howerton’s horrific persona Dennis tried to use the self-named D.E.N.N.I.S. gaslighting system on pharmaceutical rep Caylee on the show.

The actress who played her, Jill Latiano, had married Glenn just months before the episode aired.

It’s Always Sunny In Philadelphia airs Wednesdays on FX in the UK and Netflix in the UK.
